channel.title: Need help whit 4 problems
channel.description:
-how i can change the name of my client? -how i can leave ::pure for normal player -how i can move object like table? -when i conect my acc i see 1 page whit information on the other private server how i can change it
thanks!!!

item.title: Need help whit 4 problems
item.dc:creator: @staticfish1 staticfish1
item.description:
@staticfish1 wrote:

If your using Delta open your Client folder and Open client.java and search for original name
For the pure make the && playerRights >= 0
To move an object open client.java in your server folder and search for makeGlobalObject. Find the tables ID, and change the first 2 numbers next to makeGlobalObject
Again in client.java in your server folder search for any of the text that comes up when you log in and you should find the text you need to edit

Read full topic

item.title: Need help whit 4 problems
item.dc:creator: @NumberEleven NumberEleven
item.description:
@NumberEleven wrote:

Name of the client
client.java, then search the original name

Copy and Paste the original pure command, and what base are you using?

Erm, if your using [pi] go to src,server,world then object manager.
After that search the id of the table and change the coordinates of it

Last question: Search in client.java again, dont know whether it will fix it, but just try

Read full topic
